casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert Wayne STANLEY. No. 376P02-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2006. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

*776The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of May 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for Rehearing or Rehearing En Banc":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of May 2006."
